summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring partial jurisdiction over certain City (Department of Parks and Recreation) property in Calligan and Coryell's Addition and in the northeast one-quarter of the southwest one-quarter of Section 28, township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and in vacated 20th Avenue East, and in vacated East Harrison Street, to the Engineering Department to permit construction and maintenance of a storm drain with appurtenances.
